name: Team Attendance
query:
select
   eci.employee as "Employee:Link/Employee:120",
   CAST(eci.time AS date) as "Date:Date:100",
   Dayname(eci.time) as "Day",
   eci.shift as "Shift",
   TIMESTAMPDIFF(Hour,MIN(CAST(time AS time)),Max(CAST(time AS time))) AS "Total Hrs",
   FROM `tabAttendance` att
    INNER JOIN `tabEmployee Checkin` eci ON att.employee = eci.emp_id
